tests.explanation: In the original program, the loop condition in the for loop is 'i < length', which will iterate through the entire array. However, in the mutant program, the loop condition is changed to '0 < length', which will cause an infinite loop since the index 'i' is not incremented. Therefore, the mutant program will not output the correct value for 'findVal'.
Since all the elements in the array are the same value, both the original and mutant programs will output the same value for 'findVal'.
Since the value being searched for is not in the array, both the original and mutant programs will output the same value of '-1' for 'findVal'.
